lead_paragraph: Having the first pitch at 6:57 p.m. Eastern is an attempt to boost Saturday night viewership among young fans.
snippet: Having the first pitch at 6:57 p.m. Eastern is an attempt to boost Saturday night viewership among young fans.

headline.main: World Series Game 3 Gets Earlier Start
headline.seo: Game 3 of the World Series Will Have Earlier Start
headline.print_headline: World Series Game 3 Gets Earlier Start
